abstract: Reuters reports: “Comcast Corp., the largest U.S. cable operator, on Thursday posted a fall in first-quarter net profit and a drop in basic video subscribers as it faced fierce competition from phone and satellite companies.”
lead_paragraph: Reuters reports: “Comcast Corp., the largest U.S. cable operator, on Thursday posted a fall in first-quarter net profit and a drop in basic video subscribers as it faced fierce competition from phone and satellite companies.”

headline.main: Comcast Quarterly Profit Declines; Programming Segment Posts Gains
